comment_text: Know i know what to do for my math homework! thank you

if CB is a transversal of the two parallel lines, I don't understand why you wouldn't get the correct value for x if you solved for it using the property which states that the two angles of any pair of consecutive interior angles of a transversal are supplementary. i.e. by solving the equation:
2x + (x+10) = 180 for x
